posts.text:
Hi .my first time on this site
I love reading the blogs.  I have had 22 bcg treatments and I felt terrible the whole time. Trying to find out if this is normal. I feel like it has taken its toll on me. Thanks for feedback
I have high grade non invasive and have had 22 treatments the last 3 years of bcg
posts.topic: Stage 1 non invasive or invasive? I'm confused.
